entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rosetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rosetown Airport 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -16.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -21.0°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times early in the morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
